attributes.action: Review the policy on Homosexuals donating Blood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I recently contacted the National Blood Service and was told that because i am a gay man having sex with other men i would not be allowed to donate, i asked why this was and was told i would not be allowed but they could not discuss why over the phone. They offered to Post or Email me an explanation, they did and i would be more than happy to forward it on to anyone that wishes to read it. The National Blood Service told me it is not their own policy, it is goverment law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
